subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[hoe]]
# to [[hoe]]; to [[dig]]
# to [[remove]]; to [[get rid of]]; to [[eradicate]]

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|鋤草:to [[weed]]|倒把鋤頭|掛鋤|焚芝鋤蕙|濟弱鋤強|戴笠荷鋤|鋤耘|耘鋤|耕鋤|鴉嘴鋤|鋤地|誅鋤異己|鋤骨|錛鋤|鋤頭|鋤犁|鋤強扶弱|鋤奸|荷鋤|鋤頭雨|薅鋤}}

subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=서|eumhun=|rv=seo|mr=sŏ|y=se}}

# ([[호미]] 서): [[hoe]] (short-handled, one-handed)
# ([[김매다|김맬]] 서): to [[weed]], [[eradicate]], compare [[mow]], [[hew]], [[hoe]].
# ([[없애다|없앨]] 서): to [[remove]], [[eliminate]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{l|ko|鋤}} ([[호미]] 서): hoe (short-handled, one-handed)
* {{l|ko|鉏}} ([[호미]] 서): hoe (short-handled, one-handed)
* {{l|ko|錤}} ([[호미]] 기): hoe (short-handled, one-handed)
* {{l|ko|鎡}} ([[호미]] 자): hoe (short-handled, one-handed)
* {{l|ko|鎒}} ([[호미]] 호): hoe (short-handled, one-handed)
* {{l|ko|钁}} ([[괭이]] 곽): [[hoe]] (long-handled, two-handed)
* {{l|ko|钃}} ([[괭이]]/[[호미]] 촉): [[hoe]] (long- or short-handled)
